Text: Khirbet Qeiyafa (Elah Fortress; Hirbet Kaifeh) is the site of an ancient fortress city overlooking the Elah Valley.
Triplets:<Khirbet Qeiyafa
2:
--------------------
Text: Khirbet Qeiyafa:  It covers nearly 2.5 ha and is encircled by a 700-meter-long (2,300 ft) city wall constructed of stones weighing up to eight tons each.
Triplets:<Khirbet Qeiyafa
5:
--------------------
Text: Khirbet Qeiyafa:  Others are sceptical, and suggest it might represent either a North Israelite, Philistine or Canaanite fortress.
Triplets:<Khirbet Qeiyafa
